description:
This is my artsfest spotlight submission piece. Description description description

Download Instructions

  1. Download the zipped file for your operating system. 
  2. Open the file and run Cycle2ProjectHDRP.exe
  3. Walk around
  4. Admire the pretty clouds
  5. etc

Controls

  • Move with [w a s d] or arrow keys 
  • Use mouse to look around
  • Run by holding left shift
